apart – Protocol Implementation¶

This package contains the protocol implementation.

The crypto module provides functions for manipulating Elgamal ciphertexts, while the simulation module provides functions to easily run network simulations.

The apart.core sub-package contains the actual implementation of the protocol.

Submodules

  • apart.crypto — Cryptography
  • apart.simulation — Running simulations

Subpackages

  • apart.core — Protocol’s Core Components
    • apart.core.network — Network and Network Manager
    • apart.core.node — Node Code
    • apart.core.tables — Routing Tables
    • apart.core.messages — Network Messages
    • apart.core.pools — Message Pools and Batching
    • apart.core.controlled_traffic_rates —- Controlled traffic rates mechanism
    • apart.core.protocol_constants — Misc. Constants
